Entries.Biography: Eli (He/Him) is an energetic, overenthusiastic cryptozoologist and part-time adventurer. He moved to East Scarp one year prior to The Farmer with his brother, Dylan. Eli is gay. His story involves indulging his insatiable interest in the mysteries that lie beyond the edge of the forest.

Dylan.Heading: Dylan
Dylan.Description: Eli's brother, who is a reserved marine biologist.

Soot.Heading: Soot
Soot.Description: A Dust Sprite rescued from the mines that shares their home.

Energetic.Heading: Energetic
Energetic.Description: Known for being energetic and overenthusiastic.

Cryptozoologist.Heading: Cryptozoologist
Cryptozoologist.Description: Works as a cryptozoologist and part-time adventurer.

Entries.BiographyEnd: Eli is not romanceable at this time.
